alert.note: Alert for Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:12PM EDT until July 24 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waterville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Waterville, Cammal, Cogan Station, Trout Run, Little Pine State Park, Garden View and Salladasburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
